text: Simply excellent stay - Hotel seems like a relatively new property - Room and bathroom were spacious and had everything of top notch quality. Hotel staff (especially the manager Mr. Ari and front-desk Marissa) went out of their way to ensure the safety and comfort of guests. Hotel is 5 min walk from the port and the hotel offers free shuttle van for pick-up and drop to the port/ ferry terminals, if you inform them of your arrival time or ping them on whatsapp or google business chat. Breakfast was limited but good. Hotel offers car and bike for rental to tour Nusa Penida (slightly expensive - figure out if it works well for you). There is a good spa (small one but excellent services) 2 minutes walking distance from the hotel. This is a property that I would recommend to people ! Keep it up, team. The owner is lucky to have the staff that he does - professional and service oriented !
title: Excellent stay

text:
My wife and I and our son stayed here in two upper rooms for three nights. The room was clean and lovely. The bed was very large and comfortable. We were able to watch some TV, which was situated very high in the corner of the room. The shower was good. The pool was very nice and we made use of it frequently. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. The manager booked us a driver to see the sights on the west side of the island. It was only 600k for a long day of sightseeing. Well worth it. The hotel's gardens are beautiful manicured. The hotel is situated near many restaurants that are within easy walking distance on the main street. We had the hotel arrange a couple's massage for us in our room. A lovely man and woman came up and gave us probably the best 90 minute massages we had during our two weeks in the Bali area. 

The negative, which probably isn't the hotel's responsibility at all - the adjoining restaurant where guests get their breakfast etc. was pretty woeful. Pancakes with no syrup. Set menu meals with no Cokes (even though the menu pictures them). It's just a pretty lackluster effort from the restaurant. I'd recommend going for a ten minute walk towards the port and enjoying an excellent meal at one of the restaurants there. But, like I said, I don't think this is even the hotel's responsibility. The restaurant is run by different management.

So, if you're looking for a comfortable stay in an nice airconditioned room that's clean and includes a fantastic pool - go for it. You won't be disappointed. (Unless you order a meal from the restaurant!)
title: Comfortable, clean and enjoyable

text:
I’m so conflicted about this review so I’m just going to preface this by saying the staff and GM are WONDERFUL and nice people. We were supposed to check out after 4 nights but ended up checking out after the first night. The GM refunded me the 3 nights we didn’t stay immediately and apologized profusely. They did try to move our room but we were so cranky and mad after having a horrible sleep/experience that we didn’t want to stay.

We arrived and there was a ton of locals staying here. This is obviously fine except they’re very loud. The wifi was super spotty and barely worked. The hotel is near a mosque so be prepared to wake up at 4am everyday. (We had just experienced this on Gili T for the last 5 days so we were excited to sleep in). The room had a really weird smell - I think it’s their cleaning products cause the room did appear clean. In the morning we were first awoken by the mosque and once we fell back asleep the guests beside us were being incredibly loud and smoking. This wouldn’t have been a problem if the rooms were sealed but they aren’t. So at 6am I woke up to our room filled with cigarette smoke. I’m not a smoker so this made me instantly nauseous and furious.
I give this review 3* because the manager did tell us the big group that was causing issues was leaving that day so this may have been a one off experience
title: Mixed feelings on this

Room, clean, tidy, all parts worked well. Very nice rainforest shower, luxury. Airconditoner worked very well, pleasant to sleep.

Staff from Mr Toya, Nika, Nusan to all the restaurant and cleaning staff were just lovely, I can totally recommend this hotel. 

Grounds and pool were clean and very inviting. Supplied water in hut next to pool was a great idea, handy at any time to fill up your own water bottle. 

Hotel was able to provide shuttle service to local dive shop, very appreciated. 

Couple of very minor things to note, no milk at breakfast for tea, thats no worries, couple of great supermarkets 5 mins down road, fridge in your room, just buy a small carton long life milk. 

Shampoo and soap in shower, no conditioner, again, supermarket 5 mins down road, just buy a small bottle. 

Next time I go diving in Nusa Penida I will be staying here.

text:
We stayed for 7 nights in July 2022 at this lovely hotel in Nusa Penida.  From the moment you walk through the entrance you can feel your body and mind relax in this tranquil space.  The beautiful Balinese architecture is accompanied by lush gardens and a sparkling pool and despite the great location, close to the harbour and restaurants, there was no noise road disturbing the tranquility.

The sizable rooms had very comfortable beds, good bathrooms and everything you may need to ensure a comfortable stay.  

Saputra and his team of professionals go out of their way to meet their guests’ every need in a warm and friendly manner and their team of English speaking tour guides shared interesting facts and information about the island on our tours, not to mention all the beautiful photos they took for us!  Putu, one of our favourite guides, even shared some great Instagram content creating tips with us! 

I was presented with a special birthday treat at breakfast and a special song from the staff on the morning of my big day which really warmed my heart.  Believe me, the special way you are treated at Arsa Santhi will stay with you for a long time.  Astuti, Nusan, Nika and Erna were fantastic and treated us like royalty.

The team also looks after your transport needs and has no problem to make a quick stop at the ATM, for example, if needed or for late night restaurant collections.

All things considered we found it great value for money and hope to return some time in the future!
title: You have family in Paradise!

title: Excellent service in a fantastic location

text:
Unlike many travellers to Nusa Penida, I stayed for an extended period of time (one month) as opposed to a few days. The entire time was spent at Hotel Arsa Santhi and I couldn't have been happier or more satisfied every single day. Just some specifics: while the facilities were wonderful, a little garden paradise carved out in the middle of town (calming, tranquil, private, well landscapes with a very nice pool and waterfall ), The rooms were spacious, comfortable beds, well-apportioned and very clean.

But most impressive were the owner Ari and her staff, including manager Saputra. But everyone from the driver Madi to the cleaners and the breakfast staff were kind, helpful and welcoming. To give you an idea of the added customer service--on the fast boat over, my diving gear was temporarily lost. Once located, Saputra made sure the gear was picked up at the harbor and delivered to Nomads (my dive operator) by Madi. 
Additionally, there were other logistical issues during my stay when I needed something from Bali--and Saputra made the effort to get them for me on his day-off while travelling there. This was indeed above above and beyond, but that was typical of nearly all the staff who are very well trained and seem genuinely happy that you are there. I can't say enough nice things about Ari, Saputra and Hotel Arsa Santhi and will of course be staying there on my next visit. 

PS-it's very close to everything in town, including restaurants, Nomads Diving and the Harbor for travel in and out from the fast boats. Thank you Ari and everyone at Hotel Arsa Santhi for a fantastic month!
title: The Perfect Spot

text:
Was worried the hotel wasn’t ready for business since covid dragging for so long. It is NOT. Room was sparkling clean, pool is clean and staff were friendly and helpful.

text: The staff and owners of Hotel Arsa Santhi Nusa Penida made us feel right at home. We were virtually homeless upon arrival from Bali, as our planned booking for lodging had fallen through. The staff, especially Saputra, the manager, not only welcomed us but literally made alterations to one of their rooms for our stay! The hotel and restaurant are sparkling clean, and we were struck by the friendliness and warmth of all the staff, from the owner, to the manager, to the waitstaff and even the housekeepers! Hotel staff were eager to share information to help us explore their beautiful island, so that we consequently had a deep and profound travel experience as a result. They helped us arrange fabulous adventures, as well, such as catching some nice red snapper and then preparing it for us in the restaurant!  Hiring a driver for the day was also a great idea. The hotel is in a convenient location, and has pretty grounds and a very nice pool. The hotel is an excellent value. The Arsa Santhi truly felt like our home-away-from-home, and we would not hesitate to repeat our experience there! We know that we now have friends in Nusa Penida. Thank you, friends!
title: This Hotel Feels Like Home!

text:
I stayed in Arsa Santhi with my sister. Staff was really helpful and lovely. Especially Maria at the reception was awesome. She was always smiling and helping us with a good English language. We had a misunderstanding with snorkeling tour and she arranged us a private tour. Also Nika was great! :)

It was really easy and cheap to rent a scooter and you could drive the whole day without filling gas. 

Food at the restaurant was average. 
Pool was smaller than in the pictures, but pool area was very cozy anyway. Also the room was smaller than we thought. 

They have free transportation to the harbour. When we arrived to Nusa Penida, we could have got a free ride to the hotel. We didn't know that, so we walked, because hotel is located very close to harbour. My tip is that you should inform hotel in advance when you'll arrive so they know when to pick you up. 

All in all our experience of Nusa Penida and Arsa Santhi Hotel was very positive. We would go there again. :)
title: Our visit in Arsa Santhi hotel

text: As you will learn from your trip on Penida, its what Bali would have felt like maybe 15 years ago without the wave of huge tourism that's hit it! To find a hotel / resort that's crisp clean, has amazing service, an exceptionally welcoming vibe and energy, great food and a fab pool were all huge positives to take away from our trip here! Rooms are spotless and have brand new AC and there's a mini yoga terrace with Yin Yoga and Aerial Yoga in offer (check at reception what the timetable is as it change dependant on demand) Astuti, Supitra and Nusan have all been so welcoming in making our trip so peaceful and calm, special thanks to them and the whole team for a blissful stay. The location is ace as it's right i the centre of Nusa Penida and easily accessible on the flat island road that runs adjacent to the sea! We had an unforgettable diving / snorkeling experience at Pure Dive Resort (highly recommended!) Overall a beautiful stay here and sad to be leaving now!
title: Clean, welcoming smiles, great pool and atmosphere!

text:
We booked here for three nights based on previous reviews and glad we did.  After confirming our dates, Mr Toya also made our fast boat transfer booking ex Sanur with Sri Manungal, and we were met at the nearby harbour by the hotel cart for the short ride back to the hotel, located on the main road a short walk to the beach via an adjacent laneway.
Although we arrived a little before the advertised checkin time, our room was ready and as first-time visitors to NP, Parni at reception was very helpful with advice, as were all of the staff during our stay.  
There’s a resto on site serving three meals daily and drinks, a decent pool with sun lounges, yoga room, manicured gardens and the seemingly obligatory swing.  
While there was no refrigerator in the room, the staff were happy to help with ice and mixers at a very fair price.  My recommendation would be to either hire a scooter through reception or organise tours to see the best sites in the island, which are widespread and often accessed via poor roads. 
Based on our experience, I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend Arsa Santhi and I hope to return.
title: Terrific Accommodation in a Good Location

text: Arsa Santhi exceeded expectations. Due to some bad weather if was touch and go whether we could cross to Penida. Manager Toya went way above and beyond to sort ferry tickets for us, even meeting us personally at the ferry port in Padangbai to make sure all was well. Hotel itself was great - check in was smooth and the room was a welcome sight after a long day of travel Big bed, spotless room and nice bathroom so we felt relaxed and at home straight away. Everything from pool to restaurant to motorbike hire was all great and hassle free. Special mention also to the restaurant staff who were all smiles and super friendly every day. Would not hesitate to return here for another visit. Thank you again Toya and team for making our stay memorable.
title: Fantastic service

text:
We did not stay here, but we were looking for scooter rental. Staff was very helpful. Eventhough we were not staying, the were helpful to rent us a scooter. Again, many thanks to the super friendly people. 
After our Nusa Penida trip, we had a few drinks. And again service was excellent.

text: Nothing amazing to write about but the place was clean and prices are good. There is nothing great on the island so you don't want to overspend and this fit the bill. The staff was great and they can setup trips for you as needed.
title: Nice folks with clean rooms

text:
Arsa Santhi was a very relaxing place to stay. The rooms are very comfortable and pleasant and the pool and yoga area provide a tranquil place to relax. 
The hotel is located not far from the Nusa Penida ferry and has a selection of restaurants within walking distance. 
A must do is to book a car for the day with Slom (your personal chauffeur) to explore the island! The roads are tough, but his driving left us feeling that we were in very safe hands. He guided us to the beautiful sites to see on the island and cautioned us on the best places to swim on the island, all in your preferred time.
title: Little oasis on an adventure island!

text:
I'd recommend the Hotel Arsa Santhi to anyone travelling to Nusa Penida, who is looking to stay over and needs a good base. The staff are friendly (as you'd expect with the Balinese), the accommodation is well priced and they have a restaurant that met all our expectations. Please try the fresh fruit juices!

The hotel also arranged a driver for us that literally made our first day fabulous! His name is Annga. His English is very good, and he just did everything to make our day special. Finishing off with sunset at Crystal Bay was the perfect ending.

Only draw back at the Hotel was the hot water. It lasted only 10mins max and then became luke warm to cold. Wasn't much of a problem for me but the Mrs definitely needed more time.

B
title: Lovely accommodation, small draw backs

text:
Impression was not good on arrival. Got picked up in the hotel buggy by a trainee driver who stalled the vehicle and couldn't make the turn into the hotel entrance. Check-in took a while - apparently due to an IT systems glitch. The girl who showed us our room refused a tip as she recognised that the service was not up to par- very decent and commendable attitude! Happy to report that service level was all uphill from there on.
Nice clean room with monster bed. Unfortunately, sleep was frequently interrupted by irritating barking of street dogs. There was not enough storage space for luggages and clothes in the room, and the bathroom could have done with more shelves for toiletries. Water pressure ran low sometimes, but there was always hot water for showers.
The hotel has its own generator, which kept the lights on when the whole street blacked out one night. You can also rent scooters from the hotel, and they also had helmets for us.
The grounds are nicely laid out and the atmosphere is relaxing, when there are no inconsiderate tourists playing "music" by the pool.
Breakfast was basic and acceptable. With a location close to many dive centres, all in all, great value for money.
title: Nice Grounds, Pool and Buildings.

text: If you visit Penida I highly recommend this place, beautiful hotel,very clean spacious rooms, giant comfortable bed, I have traveled throughout Bali and the islands many times and the quality of service here is second to none. Well done to all the staff. We will be back!!
title: Exceptional!!

text:
We visit the island  is very nice
The hotel staff are very friendly and polite
The food 🍲 is amazing teste very good price. The rooms are amazing and clean
We had a great time in Arsa Santhi

Thank you for everything
Best regards
Wilmer Lozada
From Ecuador 🇪🇨
title: Perfect hotel  Arsa Santhi

text: We really enjoyed our in this hotel. The rooms are quite big with a nice big shower and good air conditioning. The pool is great. We also had most of our lunches and dinners at the hotel restaurant and found it quite nice. The included breakfast was also nice. Above all, the staff are very friendly and helpful. They arranged car tour of the island for us at very reasonable prices and really did their best to help in any way. They took us back to the fast boat port at no additional cost. I can highly recommend this hotel if you stay in Nusapenida.
title: Very nice hotel with pool and extra friendly staff

text: close to the jetty, good staffs, clean room, average food, nice view, recommended, helping staffs, good price, memorable trip with friends, able to arrange diving and snorkeling so fast and last minute.
title: recommended!

text: We had a fabulous stay at this hotel so much so we stayed an extra two nights. It was our honeymoon and the staff gave us nice quiet room and huge fruit basket on arrival. Staff were friendly and helpful. We hired a bike from the hotel too for good price. We ate here one evening when the weather was bad. As vegans the food was fine - a veg curry and some spring rolls. The hotel is in a good area nearby to the harbour so you could walk after the boat drops you or the hotel does free transfer. The area also has some nice warungs and places to eat. Not too far over to Crystal Bay too.
title: Wonderful stay in Nusa Penida

text:
Lovely and very basic hotel.

Because the hotel is building new rooms, the noise of the construction site may bother some.

The pool is nice, decent sized and the service is friendly. I would recommend the place!
title: Lovely hotel

text: Very nice place to stay. Outside the room area is very clean and very Green. Big room, with air conditioning and big bed. Super friendly stuff. The pool area is also nice. Once elctricity went off on a whole island, but hotel has generator power so it was also a very big plus!
title: Very nice hotel

text:
Room was great in itself but we could hear people in rooms next to us. Coughing, having sex, etc. Noise travels very easily. We had a 7 month baby with us and they had no crib or high chairs.

The staff were out of this world. Absolutely great, smiling, nice, polite, reliable, friendly. Staff = amazing!

Food was poor. Limited options and we were served chicken that wasn't cooked properly. Breakfast was included which is nice but again, not very good food.

The facility was beautiful abd even though there was construction during the day, it didn't affect us much. Beautiful spot.

Nusa Penida is not the well-kept secret that they are still trying to promote. Get ready for crowds, line-ups up people dressing up to get their Instagram shots and the roads are awful. The place is beautiful, but I don't know if it's really worth going anymore.

Internet was good.

Food anywhere on the island was pretty much the biggest problem. Wherever you go, it's  pretty bad.

So back to Hotel Arsa Santhi:

Staff: 10/10
Facility: 9/10
Room: 8/10
Internet: 9/10
Pool: 10/10
Food: 3/10

If you decide to go to Nusa Penida, I would recommend booking there. We were happy with our stay.
title: Best place around

text: Rooms were clean and very spacious. It has a small garden and swimming pool which was clean. Staff was very courteous and always ready to help. It is located around 5 mins drive from the Nusa Penida harbour. There is a beach around 2 mins walking from the hotel which is not so good. Other tourist attractions like Kelingking beach, crystal beach etc are located around 45-60 mins drive.
title: Great stay, spacious and tidy rooms

text: Perfect location for exploring Nusa Penida. Just a few minutes away from the harbor. Amazing staff that went above and beyond to ensure we had an enjoyable stay. If you want to explore Nusa Penida (which is absolutely gorgeous!), you need at least two days. Arsa Santhi is a perfect base camp for that. Highly recommend!
title: Great hotel in a perfect location

text: We really enjoyed our stay at Hotel Arsa Santhi. Their communication was above what we have experienced while traveling three months in SE Asia. They arranged for transportation to / from the ferry terminal and took care of all our bookings while on the Island. Very friendly staff, great communication, free breakfast, huge beds, clean facilities - good value and all you could ask for. There are decent restaurants within walking distance. We would stay here again.
title: Great Home Base for Exploring Nusa Penida

text:
I was most impressed with their communication.  I was arriving from mainland Bali and they were so helpful in directing me where to catch a boat to come to Nusa Penida.  They arranged for someone to meet me at the boat dock to take me to the hotel and then brought me back to the dock when I was returning to Bali.  They arranged 2 different tours for me, which were both amazing.  
I really liked the pool with it's wall that was a waterfall.  The sound was very relaxing.  They offered yoga twice a day with a woman named, Gizelle, who was quite a dynamic woman.  She was super helpful in teaching me the proper techniques and poses.  It was a class called sky flow yoga and I had never done this before.  Great to have the option to do yoga right at the hotel.  
The staff was very helpful and I liked that breakfast was included.  

Thank you Arsa  Santhi for a wonderful vacation in Nusa Penida.
title: Perfect place to stay while exploring Nusa Penida

text:
Stayed for three nights, was very happy with the place overall! Especially the staff could not have been  better, smiling people and great service, who do not "push" you to buy extra services, like in some places.

Rooms, the pool area, and the garden are all very well maintained. Rooms could have more wardrobe space but for such a short stay we were more than fine. (Please give a raise to your gardener for such a wonderful job he or she is doing!)

Location is extremely convenient for traveling around Nusa Penida (hotel has nice scooters available but make sure to book it early as they're very popular). Quiet and relaxing neighborhood with plenty of restaurants around, beach accessible by walking.

Thanks for the relaxing time you offered us! Will stay here again for sure the next time we're around.
title: Perfect for our Nusa Penida adventure

text:
Warmly recommend, friendly staff, good breakfast, clean rooms. Only one negative thing: the rooms are build so lightly that you can hear neighbours talking. 
They even picked us from the harbour.
Scooter rental as well.
title: All good

text:
Nice staff, good rooms cheap and nice driver for half the day.
Really friendly, good food and pool.
I would definatly go back here.
Helped you out with Tours, boat trips and what you should go see on your stay there.
title: Nice place

text: I have nothing but good to say about this hotel. Easy access, close to harbour. High standard, modern clean, very nice beds and friendly staff who really made sure we had a nice stay. Nice pool with tempered water and enough chairs, restroom and shower. Good breakfast and Indonesian food in the restaurant. Organised transport to harbour for free when we left. Only bad was construction of new rooms from 8 am in January 2019, but they warned us before checking in so not a problem.
title: Perfect!

text:
The staff really friendly, any problem or question sorted immediately. The rooms could not be more perfect, and also you get massive beds. Swimming pool is amazing. When the electricity gone in the whole island they just switched on a generator and we were the only place with electricity, which just make it legendary.

Good value of money.
title: Best place in Nusa Penida

text: Arrived at Arsa Santhi after having stayed one night in other accomodation on Nusa Penida that was bellow par. They were welcoming and immediately sorted us 3 rooms for me, my girlfriend and our friends. The rooms were immaculate, the pool beautiful and the biggest bed I have ever seen. All the staff were incredibly welcoming and helpful and couldn't have been more friendly. Yoga classes on site and sorted us massages by the pool. The owner was friendly and helpful and it truly was the best place we've stayed at in Bali. Value for money and true Balinese hospitality!
title: We loved everything!

text:
Came here because of the reviews and the price, it did not disappoint. We called the hotel and they gladly sent a car to pick us up. They were very enthusiastic and informative on the way over to the hotel, and when I asked if they had coconuts at the hotel, they told me we could stop at a place that sold them on the way there. Great!
The rooms were clean, AC was good, fridge even had space for a coconut :D
The atmosphere at the hotel was nice and relaxing. They even had a little hut to do yoga in. Not too many rooms so it didn't get crowded. Pool was nice and clean, and the food at the restaurant was decent. The staff however, were very nice and always greeted you with a smile and went out of their way to accommodate you.
The management at the hotel also helped us with getting a driver to go to the destinations/attractions we wanted to go to for a very good price. Our driver was Slom and he was a great guy and drove us safely and promptly to our destinations. He also did a good job as our guide at the destinations we went to. Some of the roads are in very rough shape so we were glad he was driving us. 
If I ever come back to this island, I know where I'll stay! 

TLDR: Great place, great price, great staff
title: Great place, great price, excellent staff

text:
We absolutely loved it here, Arsa Santi was the most amazing stay we have had in Bali. The beds are amazing and clean, the staff is sooo helpful. We could do yoga, get massages at the room. Arta and Slom are super friendly and give great advise for any tours and trips. The pool is perfect, there is hot water and aircon in the room. They also help out with shuttles to and from the pier for your luggage. Could not have asked for a better experience 
on this island.
title: Absolutely the best place in Nusa Penida

text:
Rented two rooms here for 4 nights. One King, and one twin. Rooms a very clean and have great air conditioning. Grounds are maintained well and are very nice. Located close to the harbor, but if you have more than a back pack you'll probably want to get a taxi. The restaurant has decent prices and I recommend the chicken club sandwich. The hotel rents scooters at a decent price, but if you need more than 70cc check the harbor.
The pool was having issues when we first arrived. The water was murky with white floaties creating the murkiness. The next day the murkiness was gone so we swam. But the following day it was back. Not sure what was going on there. 

There was a little pricing snafu at check out, but a quick phone call to the lady I made the booking with and it was sorted out. 
Would definitely stay here again.
title: Definitely Stay Here!

text:
Overall we were pleased with our choice to stay here. We booked for 4 nights then extended the stay for an extra night at late notice and staff were very helpful, rebooking us into our existing room.  

Reception staff were great with helping us to organise excellent drivers for exploring the island and they offered good advice on the best way to see the places that we wanted to visit (from our pre-researched list).

The location was a short walk to the beachfront via a laneway, with a store conveniently next door for buying water etc. All staff had a friendly, helpful attitude.

The room was clean, aircon effective, WiFi reliable bed was huuuuge and comfortable with nice sheets & duvet. There was a good sized portable drying rack in the room - very handy for drying bathers and hand washing. The only room downsides were the lack of a luggage rack for bags and the bath towels and bath mats have truly seen better days - they were permanently discolored and stained - the worst we have ever encountered!

The grounds are lovely and well maintained, although there was a problem with the pool when we arrived (due to heavy rainfall apparently) - the pool looked cloudy and univiting and it took several days of staff working to resolve the issues. The day we checked out it seemed like the issues had finally been resolved.

The breakfast menu was pretty standard - nothing to complain about. The restaurant was pretty full every night from people staying at hotel plus people from surrounding accommodations. We enjoyed the meals that we chose.
title: A Decent Hotel Close to the Port

text: My husband and I were staying at the hotel Arsa Santhi in Nusa Penida for one night. It was a fair stay for the price (except poor sound isolation between accommodations).  But the food is absolutely awful. We had breakfast there and the omelette with banana I had there was the worst I’ve ever had. Too much oil, greasy, cold and not eatable. So was the coffee. So if staying there I woud not recommend the breakfast.
title: Fair stay and very poor food

text: We stay there for one night. So room noise insulation is Zero actually impossible to sleep because of noise from other rooms and construction works in middle of place. Breakfast is under minimum standards. Rooms are clean and staff is ok.
title: Noisy place to be

text:
This hotel has nice rooms and nice public spaces.
Lovely garden area =)

Beds are big and have a good quality!

If you have a bigger group, maybe you wish to order breakfast a day earlier to speed up the process a bit =)

Staff here is very helpfull!
You can always ask them about transfer to some nice destination on this island and they will help organizing it.
title: Good service! Nice rooms!

text:
I enjoyed the hotel very much. The bed was huuuuuuge and all of the amenities were great; AC worked very well, bathroom was fine, pool was great, hotel grounds were extremely clean and the staff were extremely friendly. They have a driver onsite that can take you around the island for an affordable amount. If you have a group, it’s even cheaper since you can split it amongst yourselves.  They also have motor bikes to rent out for like, $5 usd per day.
The hotel is only a 5-10 min walk from the harbor so if anyone asks to take you, decline and just walk. Use your GPS and follow the road... it’s easy! 
I stayed in room 103
title: 3 day stay plus activities around the island

text:
We didn’t stay at this hotel, but we came here because the atm had run empty and we needed money to catch a boat back to Bali. We asked the staff if we could pay with card and get money in return and they gladly helped us! Without them we would be stuck on the island with no place to stay and without any money.

Remember guys, always bring extra cash to the islands!
title: Big help!

text:
Stayed here for 2 nights in room 203 and during check in everything seem fine however during check out was treated like i try to get away from the hotel without paying. Booked through booking.com and they said it’s from CTRIP. What the hell they talking about, why during check out they mentioned about this? Please train and teach your staff again, it’s a practice of the hotel to get everything during check in not during check out! Took me almost 30 mins to settle this and Lucky that the hotel is very near to the pier otherwise i will miss the boat. 

If you booking and find the difference between with or without breakfast is huge, better not. The choice is only fried rice, banana pancake, toast and egg and you have to choose 1 of these choices and if you want more, you have to pay! 

The room i stayed is 203, the shower ceiling got mold. So choose another room if you can.

The only good thing about this hotel is location, very near to toya pakeh pier and they provide free transfer. 

If i ever return to Nusa Penida, i will not choose this hotel. 3 stars hotel with 4 star price and 1 star service.
title: Not yet pay for the room?

text:
Very kind staff that helped us whenever we raised questions or needed assistance (advices, phone call with our speedboat agency, free pick up from the port etc) 
We just spent there 4 entire days and we’re really surprised. It’s the most beautiful hotel I have seen on that island in those 4 days.
title: Beautiful, Clean & Excellent Service

text: Very helpful staff! Only place on the island to get money out with visa! Life saver :)will definitely be back. Thanks so much to the staff for being so helpful and caring. Spoke English very well which was also helpful.
title: Visa credit card

text: Beautiful hotel, great pool, very  nice staff. Made me feel at home during my stay with them. There is a lot to do on the island and they can help you booking with any of this. Talk to Arthur, he can help with anything! Thanks
title: Best service on Pendia

text: The service I received at this hotel was incredible. Everyone was friendly and welcoming. Amazing rooms, super clean. Loved staying here, would come again. Don’t think twice about reserving this place!
title: AMAZING SERVICE

text:
We had a lovely stay at Arsa Santhi for 3 nights. Rooms are really clean, huge beds, great AC, scooters to rent, and a nice breakfast!
The staff is friendly and always willing to help. They booked a snorkeling tour for us and offer pick up and drop off to and from the boat.
title: Great stay for 3 nights

text:
We had a good two night stay at Arsa Santhi. Really recommend Ba Bars down the road for food if you visit. 

Positives:
+ Huge beds which are incredible 
+ We organised a tour of the West Coast of the island through reception which was really nice
+ The pool is lovely 
+ Banana pancakes at breakfast were great 

Negatives:
- Construction work very, very noisy next to our villa beginning early in the morning. Not nice and if we hadn’t been getting up early to explore the island anyway we’d have been very annoyed at this. 
- Reception staff were pretty clueless about how we would get to Sidemen from Penida... The owner of the hotel promised us he would book our boat transfer and arrange a taxi then he disappeared and we never saw him again despite giving him our number for WhatsApp? We were also initially told by another member of staff we would need to get a two hour slow boat then 2 hour taxi but this wasn’t the case.
title: Nice hotel slightly let down by staff service

text: Stayed for 3 nights staff are very friendly and welcoming. Beds are massive, hotel very clean. Great stay, location is a short walk to beach and restaurants, price is right. Hotel restaurant food is good to.
title: Great place

text: We had such a great time at this hotel. The personnel was really friendly and the size of the beds is just insane! They help us the last day of our trip with the fast boats tickets (companies weren't sure to go because of the weather), organisation was well done !
title: Amazing stay at Arsa Santhi

text:
The hotel is adorable, clean, friendly staff, nice breakfast, cute pool. They picked us up from the harbor and brought us back, the location is great and they have a nice restaurant that’s open from morning till night. 

The “bad” things are very minor: no face towels, shower water current is very weak.
title: Very sweet hotel great location

text: Nice and charming staff, clean room and beds are huge... The rent for a scooter is 75k per day, close to several of the top diving centers (blue corner dive, sanctum, ...). The restaurant is ok, not a lot of choices but it is pretty much all you will get on the island anyway. Nice stay, I will recommend.
title: Arsa Santhi stay

text: We stayed at the Arsa santhi hotel for 2 nights and absolutely loved it there. The breakfast was very delicious and the rooms were clean and beautiful. There is even the perfect pool area to just relax. And then the staff was helpful and kind all the time. Definetly can recommend this hotel.
title: Beautiful Hotel in Nusa Penida

text: I had good time staying at this place. The staff were very friendly & nice. One of the staff member wrote down a list for us to do on our next city of destination. Our rooms were clean & tidy. Food at the hotel was delicious as well.
title: Great staff

text:
Lovely hotel,  nice and cozy.  Clean and spacious room. For the double bed,  they combine two single beds into one extra large bed.  Very comfortable. 
The staff is very attentive and helpful.  
The free / compliment transportation from and to the boat terminal is a big plus.
title: Nice and cozy hotel

text: Nice stay, clean room ,near the port, nice restaruant,and modern hote,we stay 3 nigth here, the staff very freadly and helpuly ,beatiful island,also amazing view,the best for trip and explore the island
title: Nusa penida

text:
We stayed 3 nights at the hotel. The conditions of the rooms were ok, but the wc rooms could have better conditions. 

The staff is very kind, always available and ready to help! We felt very confortable and Secured in the hotel thanks to the staff.

The hotel pool is very good and great for relaxing! 

The hotel is very near the harbor and in the center of Nusa Penida which allows to know the island better!
title: Simple but cozy and welcoming hotel

text:
We spend some Time on the hotel
It was wonderful. The swimming pool is amazing
Very good location and staff is very nice, they gave us good recommendations to discover the island 
The restaurant and breakfast are also good 
Arta is very nice and friendly
title: Summer 2018

text:
Arta welcomed us the first day and was really friendly. We spend few days there and it was really a good time 
Location is good and swimming pool is nice
Thé hôtel has a restaurant which is good and offres variety
title: Holidays 2018

text:
Best accomodation in Asia in a trip of 21 days. Nusa penida is just amazing and the hotel is perfect compared to other hotel with the same price.
Arta, the Office guy it's amazing! He will manage for you everything in a very friendly way!
title: Perfect Quality/Price Accomodation

text:
Really nice hotel, staff was very friendly to help us! I recommend this hotel in Nusa Penida.
Is located really close to the port 
There is a beautiful swimming pool and really nice area and bedrooms thank you
title: Really nice stay

text: We were in Arsa Santhi for discovering Nusa Penida. The location is perfect (you can go walking from the harbour). The pool and facilities are beautiful. Good food in the restaurant.But the best thing is the staff: receptionists, people working at the restaurant, these people are really kind and proffesional and made us have a really great stay!
title: Perfect hotel to stay in Nusa Penida
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: very beautiful Hotel! Really clean. The staff is really kind and hulpfull. I want to come here again. The pool is also clean. You can rest here. Really quiet. The perfect spot for scuba diving. Perfect!
title: Hotel

text:
My wife was super happy that she found a place with hot water. 

The host and reception was super friendly. The place was clean. There was some noise during the day (started at 9-10am) as they are building more bungalows,but most days we spent out exploring Nusa Penida anyway.

Best service from the host and reception. Friendly staff! Would definitely stay again.
title: Great place, hot water and super service

text:
Me and my wife stayed stayed for 2 nights ( should of been 3 ) in the beginning of August .

Nusa Penida is a very “raw” island without all the tourist infrastructure that people are used to, and this hotel is the best place to stay.

The staff is fantastic , very kind , helpful and always trying to help .

Unfortunately for us during our stay we had a big earthquake in Lombok , that gave everyone a bad time !

But one fantastic thing was all the staff , the general manager ( sorry don’t remember the name ) manage to get everyone in vans , take us to the top of the hill , got us waters and manage to stay calm in a hard situation. All this because a tsunami warning was there.

All staff did fantastic.

It’s a clean space near the road , with some nice restaurants all around and very close to the harbor.

I highly recommend staying time in this place if you visit this island .
title: Very nice and safe place

text: We had a very good day with Teja, the #driver of the hotel who brought us in the best places of nusa penida. He speaks very well English and pay Intention to your expectations and adapts the rythm of the tour depending on your will. Teja will make sure you have a good day, in a good mood (you can connect your own music in the car!) and see good points of view. Do not hesitate to book your tour with him when arriving at the hotel!
title: Very good #driver / guide tour!

text: We stayed 2 nights at this hotel. The location is excellent as it took only 5 min. to the boat jetty from/to Sanur Bali. Gede the manager also help to arrange a solo diving safari and tour around West part of the island as well as renting a scooter for us. We will definitely recommend this hotel to friends coming to Nusa Panida.
title: will definitely recommend this hotel to friends coming to Nusa Panida.

text: Nice place, good food and very friendly staff. Arfa was very helpful ! I definitely recommand Arta Santhi for anyone staying in Nusa Penida (beautiful island still preserved from mass tourism). Hope to be back soon !
title: Very nice staff

text: An all around amazing experience at this hotel even before checking in. Because of the weather, the boats weren’t running to Penida as normally scheduled. The hotel reached out and remained in constant communication to ensure safe and timely arrival. The staff helped way beyond expectations. A must stay if you travel to Nusa Penida.
title: Redefines Hospitality

text:
We had a very good stay at Arsa Santhi. The rooms are spacious and clean, the pool is great if you want to take a break from exploring Nusa Penida, and the staff is very friendly. Most of them are quite bad in English, though, but the blonde guy (think his name was ‘Madhi’) spoke it quite OK and helped us with everything! 

Breakfast is included (and quite tasty), and motor cycles are for rent at the hotel. You can also ask for guided tours, but I didn’t do these.

On the downside, I do believe they are asking too much money for what you receive. Other stays on Nusa Penida (f.e. Nusa Penida Homestay) provide the same level of cleanliness and friendliness but are way cheaper! The only big difference is the pool, it’s up to you to decide if it’s worth the extra bucks.
title: Relaxing stay

text:
We,  my 18 Years old childrens and me, found here a very nice place. 
The owner managed Hotel offers you nearly new, big and high,full climate rooms, with a terrace nice and quiet. 
Also the beds are big size and comfortable. They made it possible for us, to bring a third bed inside of our room(Pictures 3). 
You find a sufficient Pool and a Restaurant "in the house ", open during the whole day. 
On our 3 weeks trip,  through Java and Bali, we found some different locations. 
Arsa Santhi is with big distance the best we met, in the middle price segment!
The people that are working here,  are proud with the work they do.
I am really surprized of the warm hospitality at this place. 
If you need a support or a helping hand, they give it to you. 

Therefore 5 Stars, because it's worth! 

Sama Sama. 

Martin Gralki
title: Excellent Hotel

text: We've been here in April 2018 for 2 nights stay with some friends we got 3 rooms upstairs and we had a nice comfortable stay, building look new, bedroom is big and my favorite is the restaurant is have a good food. so this is one of my favorite hotel in Nusa Penida.
title: Cozy and nice hotel

text:
Staff were very friendly and accommodating, happy to help out with anything. Madi on reception was a great help from restaurant recommendations, sightseeing and booking boat transfers for us.
Location is good as it is close to the ferry port. 
Rooms were immaculate, bed was huge, it was quite firm though. The walls between rooms slightly thin, you can hear your neighbours very easily. 
Breakfast menu needed more options.

Would definitely stay again.
title: Great rooms, location and even better staff

text: The room was clean but bed sheets and towels got some little stains but nothing big. Sometimes they forget to bring more soap or coffee during the daily cleaning but that's not a very big deal either. The bed was huge and comfortable, ac was working well and shower got hot warter and good pressure. The breakfast was ok, you choosed it from the menu. The pool area and the garden were very nice and clean. Staff was always smiling, friendly and helpful, thank you! We think that the hotel was good value for your money and we would choose it again.
title: Friendly staff!

text:
Location is great for the fast boat from sanur. 
Staff are excellent and food was good at the restaurant. 
3rd time to nusa penida and i'd go back to this place again.
Good breakfist, good swiming pool,good garden, and free pick up and drop up from hotel to hor bour
title: Good hotel and friendly start

text: Artua, on the hotel staff, was great! He was very helpful and provided everything we needed. He made the stay easy and relaxing. If you go there, ask for him! The hotel itself was very nice as well. My wife and I loved it!
title: Helpful staff!

text: We stayed for two nights. It really was a wonderful place! The room is clean, quiet, and spacious. They also provided friendly staffs that could give us many information around the island. The breakfast was also good, there were many choices and everything’s delicious. In conclusion, the hotel is very recommended for everyone who loves peaceful and relaxing environment with a reasonable price.
title: Family travelling

text: Clean, friendly staff and with all of the amenities you could want from a hotel on this tiny island. Great location next to the harbor, walking distance to many little shops. Breakfast was tasty and the staff is very accommodating, ensuring you get the most out of your stay on nusa penida. If you’re looking for a place to stay, this should be your first choice.
title: Everything you need

text: Fabulous place, clean, great pool and very lovely staff! Helped arrange a driver who was also a lovely guy. We’re able to provide express laundry for cheap and rent bikes for 75K a day. Huge comfy beds and provide onsite food which was nice. Only downside is the WiFi wasn’t so good but that’s understandable being on an island.
title: Fab!

text: We really loved our stay in Arsa Santhi. There's not many good hotels in Nusa Penida, so we were really lucky to find this one. If you want one a room of good quality at good price and in a perfect location (walking distance from where the boat leaves you) this is definitely the one! We loved the huge bed in the room and the lovely pool. The staff was exceptional too, always smiling and helpful, especially Dewi at the reception. Thanks so much!
title: Lovely stay in Nusa Penida

text:
Hotel is a reasonable price, the staff were friendly, helpful and made our stay excellent. As with most places the food was variable, some dishes such as the chicken fried rice were great. However spaghetti bolognaise was only okay. Breakfast could include toast as standard instead of only with certain dishes.
These are minor points however, and when I return to Nusa Penida I will gladly return to this hotel.
title: Excellent staff

text: Our overall stay was nice. We were there for 2 nights to explore Nusa Penida, we needed more to to explore! The hotel was a nice base for us, room was spacious and air conditioning worked, bathroom was clean and nice shower. Pool area was nice but needed a towel to put down on the chairs. Food was only ok, and the price didn’t break the bank but wasn’t a good deal either. Found a great Italian/French restaurant down the road ( HIGHLY recommended) we like to try to stick to traditional Bali food but this place was amazing! Good hotel, good location, really nice staff!
title: Very friendly staff
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
Very friendly staff, doing everything for you and always want to help.
I arrived without booking and could get a room at the last minute without problems.
They brought my sister and I to a restaurant next to the hotel by scooter, and waited for me to bring me back.
Very grateful to meet nice people from there.
Great staff and comfortable room :)
title: Great and relaxing
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Beautiful swimming pool Great location, as it's near the harbour and all of the attractions Delicious breakfast You can rent a scooter with helmets for 70k per day. Staff is super friendly. I want to come again
title: Friendly staff
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: I have traveled a lot in Indonesia, I got to many places, but each of them was my favorite place. The staff are attentive, they help you in everything. The accommodation is perfect, the food is delicious. I can only higly recommend it to anyone !!!
title: Mr.

text:
One of the cool thing to do in nusa penida is to hire scoteer and rome around and arsa will manage you scotee for 70k at the hotel itself 
Ask them to pick you up and drop you at the port they will do it for free 
Whats app or call 081236766618 to manage the pick ups
title: Nice hotel

text: Clean, nice hotel with pool. Very neat rooms with aircon, good beds and shower. Friendly staff,  nothing bad to say.  Restaurant at hotel was also nice, good food. Good value for your money. If you need laundry or motorbike, they will take care it for you.
title: Very good basic hotel

text: During my trip to Nusa Penida, I stayed in Hotel Arsa Santhi Nusa Penida. They have clean room, good services, with great price. I have a lovely stay there, and I'd love to recommend the hotel to my friends when they are planning to have a trip to Nusa Penida! ;)
title: A Comfortable & Clean Hotel In Nusa Penida

text: last week traveling with family to Bali ... and finally stay at Arsa Santi Nusa Penida... nice place, comfortable and as expected .... I will recommend to my friends also to stay in here  if want to visit to bali....
title: nice place, comfortable and as expected

text: It was an excellent place for my family to stay. Excellent Hotel, rooms are clean and comfortable great location, excellent service, will stay again. I recommend the Hotel to everybody travelling to Nusa Penida.
title: Lovely hotel and service

text: I kinda lack information of Nusa Penida Island, but the the staff  was very helpful when i asking about traveling destination in this Island. Not only that, the staff (Mr. Toya) gave us the complete info and overing drive us to some beautiful place in Nusa Penida. Did i mention it's clean and lovely hotel to stay also? Yes it is. Thank you Arsa Santhi Hotel. It was a great experience
title: Great Services and Very Helpful Staff

text: Great pool.  Nice rooms with air.  They will pick you up from ferry for free but you have to call ahead.  Food was good.  Staff very friendly and they rent scooters.  Rented scooters for a day and then rented their van and driver to tour some other places as my wife was doublingx on scooter and roads pretty rough. 50,000 idr.   Not to expensive for 4 hour tour. We went to broken beach and kelingkling.  Driver was willing to wait for us if we wanted to climb down and up but had done previous day on scooters.  Half hour down and 55 minutes up.  BRING LOTS OF WATER if you going to do climb but we'll worth it.
title: Fantastic place

owner_response.text:
Hi keeth,

Thank you for giving us such a wonderful 5-star review. We are so excited to hear you have climbed down to Kelingking Beach. Such a rough and steep track. Beautiful beach waits down there. Safety First.

Best regards,

Toya
<
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The Hotel is located close to everything, especially all the attractions on the west side of the island. The staff where very helpful, service minded and kind. The can help you arrange day trips. Rooms clean and large.
title: Amazing service

text: We were pleasantly surprised at everything about this little place.  The staff was friendly and helpful. The rooms were simple but clean and in excellent repair. The location is excellent for scootering around the island.  The restaurant is simple but the breakfasts were more than adequate.  We were there on Valentine’s Day and the staff cleaning our room wrote HVD in flower petals on our bed.  Such a nice touch.  We would definitely recommend it.

text:
Stayed here for two nights.  Immediately after booking on booking.com, the hotel manager wrote to me on WhatsApp and asked when and what time we were sailing to the island.  Transfer from the port to the hotel was provided to us free of charge.  When checking in, the hotel staff met us and offered us iced tea.  The room was clean, cleaned daily.  Room what we have chosen overlooking the garden.  The hotel has a swimming pool, a swing, an outdoor yoga area.  On the second day, we booked a tour of the west coast of Nusa Penida.  We were given a comfortable car with air conditioning and a driver.  The driver is a polite and attentive employee named Gun.  Hi to him )))))

 Separately, I would like to note the courtesy and attentiveness of the staff, excellent service, delicious cuisine.  If ever we are on Nusa Penida, then we will definitely come back here again.

Остановились здесь на две ночи. Сразу после бронирования на booking.com мне в WhatsApp написал менеджер отеля, спросил, когда и во сколько мы приплываем на остров. Трансфер от порта до отеля нам предоставили бесплатно. При заселении нас встретили сотрудники отеля, предложили нам холодный чай. В номере было чисто, убирались ежедневно. Номер мы выбрали с видом на сад. В отеле есть бассейн, качели, площадка для йоги на открытом воздухе. На второй день мы забронировали экскурсию по западному побережью Нуса Пениды. Нам дали комфортную машину с кондиционером и водителем. Водитель - вежливый и внимательный сотрудник по имени Гун. Привет ему ))))) 

Отдельно хочется отметить вежливость и внимательность персонала, отличный сервис, вкусную кухню. Если когда-нибудь будем на Нуса Пенида, то обязательно вернёмся сюда ещё.
title: Лучший отель на Нуса Пенида

text:
Nous avons séjourné en famille au Arsa Santhi pendant ces vacances de Noël.

Les + :
- Chambres très propres et confortables.
- Staff extrêmement serviable, avenant, et sympathique.
- Très bonne position géographique près du port et de plusieurs beach clubs très sympas.
- Lit double gigantesque (jamais vu ça) dans la chambre double (2 lits moyens collés).

Les - :
- Une assiette de fruits « légère » par chambre et non par personne au petit déjeuner. 
- Le salon de massage affilié à l’hôtel n’était pas génial.
- Les scooters coûtaient 75 000 roupies la journée ce que nous avons trouvé assez cher.

Nous voudrions particulièrement remercier : 
- Maria qui répondait à toutes nos demandes, que ce soit un besoin de transport depuis ou jusqu’au port, depuis le restaurant Amok Sunset ou pour garder les bagages après le checkout le temps qu’on visite Nusa Lembongan.

- Diah qui a été géniale à s’occuper de ma blessure au pied avec beaucoup d’attention et de délicatesse en plus d’assurer un service au restaurant avec un grand sourire.

- Sidana qui nous a aidés à trouver un bon restaurant italien près de l’hôtel et nous y a emmenés en voiture alors qu’il pleuvait des cordes dehors.

Merci à tous!
Julien
title: Staff excellent et super serviable

text:
Ещё в России планировали свой отпуск на Бали.Нашли тур агенство,которое организует поездки на остров Нуса Пенида.Но нам не понравился отель ,предлагаемый этой фирмой, т.к при нас были чемоданы,деньги и документы,мы уезжали с района Чандидаса, с порта Кусамба, а назад в Санур и на заселение в Нуса Дуа. По этому экскурсия с полным багажом. Нашли на этом сайте этот отель.Мне понравились отзывы, и что я могу оплатить отель находясь дома. В итоге мы оплатили наше пребывание  с 30.07.19 на 31.07.19 за одну ночь 2863 рубля. 
  Отель не очень большой.Регистрация быстрая, на против ресепшен находится кафе, в котором потом завтракали.Завтрак не шведский стол, а можно выбрать одно блюдо второе и напиток.Бонусом приносят тарелочку с фруктами.И после заказа ,ожидание примерно минут 20 когда приготовят.
 По нашей просьбе нас заселили на 2й этаж, 2х этажного корпуса. Перед входом в номер собственная маленькая веранда с двумя креслами и столиком.На против бассейн и веранда,где занимаются йогой.Территория хоть и не большая,но всё зелено,красиво.Рядом с отелем справа есть магазинчик,там можно купить воду и всё необходимое,чуть дороже чем на Бали. Касающееся самого номера.Очень просторный, огромная кровать,мягкая, удобная ,В номере прохладно, есть кондиционер..Всё для приготовления чая и кофе,т.е чайник есть.Холодильник, сейф,фен ,тапочки, средства гигиены. WiFi не очень быстрый,на веранде получше, а у бассейна ещё лучше,а совсем хорошо после 11 вечера.Но вот шумоизоляция отсутствует совсем.Двери обычные из тонкой фанеры,по этому пока народ сначала шумели в бассейне, потом в кафе, уснуть да же не возможно,хоть мы и набегались на экскурсии.
На одну ночь нормально,но вот на несколько дней,слишком шумно по вечерам, засыпание будет зависеть от того,как все разойдутся из кафе.
title: Бронировали на 1 ночь для 2х дневной экскурсии по острову Нуса Пенида

text: Hele lieve mensen, goed ontbijt en super service. Vanaf de boot stonden ze ons al op te wachten, we werden direct naar het hotel gebracht. De kamer was mooier dan we dachten, erg grote bedden en de hygiene is ook top. De mensen zijn erg behulpzaam, je kon er een scooter huren en ze hielpen ons met de uitstapjes. Onze scooter is onderweg stuk gegaan(eigen schuld) we zijn door een plaatselijke boer terug gebracht en eenmaal terug voelde we ons wel schuldig. Voor de mensen bij het hotel was het geen enkel probleem, ze hadden binnen 1 minuut een nieuwe scooter klaar staan. Ook het ontbijt was erg goed, we hadden de eieren nog nooit zo lekker ergens gegeten. Om uit eten te gaan hebben we 2 tips, ga naar rechts voor de Krusty Krab, een gezellig restauratie langs de kant van de weg. En links zit een italiaans tentje, ook druk en gezellig. Voor de rest moet je niet zoveel verwachten, ze zijn nog niet helemaal aan het toerisme gewenst in het plaatsje.
title: Perfect

text:
Мы с семьей наконец выехали на долгожданный отдых. Выбирали отель по отзывам посетителей, так как друзья не рассматривали такой вариант и не были здесь.
Выбором остались полностью довольны. Место красивое. Мы приехали нас приветливо, встретили на ресепшене, показали как пройти к нашим номерам. 
Обслуживание персонала на высшем уровне.
По комфорту всё устраивало, жена и дети были очень рады. Свежий воздух, в номере всегда свежесть и чистота, что не может радовать. 
Жаль, что пробыли очень мало времени, ведь не хотелось уезжать.
title: Шикарное место!

Bref allez y les yeux fermés vous ne serez pas déçus 
Daniele

text:
Les points positifs:
- sommes arrivés à 10h à l’hotel et avons pu récupérer notre chambre à 11h alors que le Check in était prévu à 15h
- staff accueillant et au petit soin
- chambre propre et spacieuse (manque de rangement)
- bien placé (restaurant et centre de plongée à moins de 10’ à pied)

Les points négatifs:
- piscine trop petite pour l’ensemble des clients (compliqué d’avoir un transat de dispo)
- beaucoup de bruit la nuit ( prière et hurlements de chiens) mais pas de la faute de l’hôtel. Peut être privilégier les chambres éloignées de la route 
- resto de l’hôtel pas top
title: Moyen +

text:
Super hôtel, la piscine est vraiment sympa. Il est proche de plusieurs très bons restaurants. Pancake, french toast et salade de fruit top pour le petit-déjeuner.

text:
Die Anlage ist wirklich traumhaft schön. Die Zimmer sind schlicht aber schön und vor allem sauber. Das Gleiche gilt für das Bad. Hier fühlt man sich wohl. Für den Preis bekommt man hier viel geboten. 

Das Personal ist sehr freundlich! Terima Kasih :)

Sehr zentral, hafennah gelegen. Das Hotel hat uns sowohl vom Hafen abgeholt als auch wieder zum Hafen gebracht. 

Frühstück war lecker und ausreichend. (z. B. Nasi Goreng)

Roller mieten war auch unkompliziert. (Allerdings ist das Rollerfahren auf Nusa Penida der Horror. Auf den guten Straßen wird man fast von den Autos abgeräumt. Auf den schlechten Straßen mussten wir teilweise sogar absteigen - das hat aber nichts mit dem Hotel zu tun 😉)
title: Traumhaftes Hotel

text:
Das Hotel ist in einem sehr sauberen Zustand, es werden jeden Tag die Zimmer gereinigt und neue Handtücher auf das Zimmer gebracht. Das Frühstück ist sehr lecker, jeden tag frisches Obst und frisch zubereiteter Fruchtsaft. Das Personal war immer freundlich und hilfsbereit, man ist nicht mal angekommen, schon wurden die Rucksäcke vom Auto geladen und man brachte uns einen frisch gepressten Saft. 
Bei diesem Hotel kann man gleich einen Roller mieten um die Insel zu erkunden. Es war eins der besten Hotels während der 2-wöchigen Tour durch Bali. Der Manager versucht alles damit es dem Gast gut geht.
title: Die besten Tage auf Nusa Penida

text:
Zuerst einmal vornweg: die Anlage ist schön und wunderbar gepflegt, das Personal super freundlich und stets zur Hilfe, auch via WhatsApp, bereit!
Auch das Schlafzimmer ist schön und sauber, aber im Bad hörte es dann leider auf. Die Badetücher immer (in Summe 3 Mal) verschmutzt, siehe Bild. Ein Handtuch stattdessen zu benutzen nicht möglich, da es keine gibt. In Bad und Zimmer kaum Ablagemöglichkeiten, alle Lampen und der Kühlschrank waren zu Beginn ausgesteckt, das muss der Gast selbst erledigen. 
In unserer 2-wöchigen Rundreise bei gleichbleibenden Preisen pro Nacht bisher das schlechteste Hotel!
title: Anlage schön, aber Ausstattung der Zimmer mangelhaft

text:
Bel hôtel, facile d'accès près du port.
Piscine et restaurant sur place, possibilité de louer des scooters pour 75krps.
Dans cadre sympathique, l'accueil est mitigé pas très chaleureux et le service n'est pas au rendez vous, la chambre qui devait être faite deux matins de suite à été faite a moitiée.. du coup pas de savon ni shampooing... Rien a dire sur le petit déjeuner qui est satisfaisant mention supplémentaire pour le banana pancake excellent  ! En bémol, les chambres sont mal isolées.. on entends tout des voisins..
Cela donne un bilan mitigé.. mais le tout est correct.
title: Belle structure / accueil pas au rendez vous..

text: V hotelu jsem nebydlel, ale vypadá parádně. Nic méně místní restaurace stojí za to. Je to více méně mix domácí a západní kuchyně, ale cokoliv jsme zkusil bylo super. Velmi milá obsluha. Čisto. Za mě za rozumný peníze sqělej výkon!😉
title: Restaurace

text: Abbiamo fatto un paio di giorni a Nusa Penida dopo aver visitato Bali. Questo hotel si è rivelato perfetto in ogni suo aspetto. A soli 5 minuti a piedi dal porto e in una posizione strategica per visitare tutta l’isola con lo scooter noleggiato direttamente in hotel. Pulito, nuovo e con l’aria condizionata. Un letto enorme in cui ci saremmo stati in 3 ed un materasso molto comodo. Ciliegina sulla torta il personale disponibilissimo, cordiale e simpatico. Ci torneremo sicuramente.
title: Tutto perfetto!

text:
Dit is een fijn hotel om te verblijven. De kamer zijn ruim en schoon en voorzien van extreem ruime bedden. Verblijf is inclusief ontbijt. Echter vonden wij het ontbijt dusdanig slecht dat we na het eerste ontbijt de overige hebben overgeslagen en ergens anders hebben ontbeten. Het hotel is aan het uitbreiden door meer kamers aan te bouwen. Het zwembad is niet in al te beste staat en de badkamer in onze kamer was ook wel aan een renovatie toe. Ik zou zeggen als bedrijf eerst het zwembad en de huisjeoge kamer voor mekaar voor ik verder ga uitbreiden.

Personeel is top!
title: Fijn hotel maar wel wat achterstallig onderhoud

text: Лучший отель в этом месте. Суперский бассейн. Arta и Astuti готовы всегда помочь. Байк брали в отеле. Ресторан в отеле, хочешь принесут к бассейну, хочешь в номер. Готовят вкусно. Такой большой кровати у нас ни где не было - 220 на 260
title: Рекомендую этот отель

text: Preis- Leistunsverhältnis stimmt. Freundliches Personal. Saubere Bungalows. Wir hatten einen angenehmen Aufenthalt. Der Chef bemüht sich sehr um das Wohl der Gäste. Zentral gelegen, nähe von dem Hafen.
title: Gute und zentrale Unterkunft

text:
Ich war 4 Nächte im Arsa Santhi und es hat mir sehr gut gefallen. 
Die Zimmer werden täglich gereinigt und die Handtücher gewechselt. 
Das Frühstück wird a la carte in ausreichender Menge serviert. 
Hauptmenü, Obst, Saft und Kaffee.
Die Anlage verfügt über eigene Motorroller die gegen geringen Preis angemietet werden können. 
Auffällig ist das außerordentlich freundliche und immer hilfreiche Personal was bei alles Fragen zur Verfügung steht.
title: Sehr nettes Personal und sehr sauber Anlage

text:
Super hôtel, très bien localisé et facile à trouver, proche du port et de la plage. 
Superbe accueil par le staff, hyper dispo, et d'une grande gentillesse. Chambres impeccables, confortables. Personnel très arrangeants, avec possibilité de louer des scooters, sorties organisées, achats des billets de bateau directement à leur bureau...
title: Génial !

text: Top hotel! Heerlijk groot bed. Super vriendelijk personeel, ze halen en brengen je naar de haven. Ook kun je hier een scooter huren voor 75000 per dag en excursies boeken. Wij gingen snorkelen met een boottrip van ongeveer 3 uur. Helaas no manta's today maar erg leuke tocht, bij 3 plekken gestopt en het kostte ongeveer 300k per persoon. Het ontbijt was prima, diner iets minder maar daar heb je op de rest van het eiland genoeg keuze in. Zwembad met handdoek service ook top! Zeker een aanrader!
title: Super

text:
Pluspunten: 
+ Erg goede service
+ Schoon kleinschalig "resort"
+ Vriendelijk en vrolijk personeel
+ Ontiegelijk groot bed (+/- 2,5 mtr. breed)
+ Erg informatief over het eiland
+ Prima keuze voor het ontbijt
+ Warm water op grote badkamer met 2 douchkoppen
+ Scooter huur aanwezig (goede scooters) 
We hebben (2 pers.) de meest ergste "offroad" wegen meester weten te maken.
+ Zwembad prima en schoon voor een verfrissende duik. 
+ Goed werkende airconditioning.
+ Voldoende kluisjes op de kamer (lees nachtkastje en lade wat met sleutel op slot kan)

- De drukke weg is erg goed te horen in de huisjes op de begane grond "kamer 102"
- Weinig opzet mogelijkheid voor je toilet artikelen alleen de zijkanten van de wasbak en deze met alleen koud water.
- Koelkastje staat naast het bed.

Kortom een heel fijn verblijf gehad!! Goede prijs/kwaliteit verhouding. Komen graag terug.
title: Heel goed verblijf gehad

text:
La habitación amplia y limpia, la piscina está genial y el personal muy amable.
La única y GRAN PEGA es que nos ponían todos los dias por megafono el rezo musulman y nos despertaba por las noches, cosa que no entiendo porque en el hotel no había musulmanes y me parece una gran falta de respeto tener que despertar a todo el mundo.
Quitando eso lo que es el hotel en sí super bien la verdad, sólo hay 10 habitaciones por lo que muchas veces en la piscina estás tú sólo.
El desayuno no está mal aunque se podría mejorar.
title: Muy buen hotel

text:
Nous avons passé 3 nuits ici, c’était agréable, calme, propre, grande chambre donnant sur le jardin, location de scooter un lit immense, il faut un gps pour sortir du lit ! Lool ! 
Personnel au tooop 
J’ai adoré
title: Super hôtel

text: We werden goed ontvangen door de receptie de kamer was nog niet schoon dus wat gegeten en handdoeken gevraagd en lekker wat rond gezwommen . Toen de kamer in schoon super groot bed we hadden kamer 101 recht tegenover het restaurant en tegenover het zwembad ideaal voor ons! De badkamer ruim en schoon en zelfs een super grote douchekop. Airco deed het goed en verder was het prima te doen we verbleven 1 nacht omdat we door moesten maar anders hadden we gerust langer willen blijven
title: Perfect

text: Dit hotel geboekt om zijn goede beoordeling en dat hebben ze waar gemaakt. Schone ruime kamers met een gigantisch bed! Wij zaten tegenover het zwembad op de 1ste etage. Ontbijt is prima, genoeg keus! Heerlijk zwembad met daarbij voldoende ligbedjes. Handdoeken voor bij het zwembad zijn af te halen bij de receptie. Vanuit het hotel 2 excursies geboekt en deze waren goed geregeld! Gewoon boeken dus!
title: Heerlijk hotel!

text: Le personnel est très sympathique, arrangeant et fait tout pour que vous soyez bien (malgré quelques petites maladresses pour l'arrivée tardive de notre taxi). La piscine est agréable. Demandez une chambre éloignée de la route pour être au calme. La chambre Deluxe vue piscine est spacieuse et le lit très grand (un coffre serait toutefois utile). Le petit dej est malheureusement vraiment moyen (manque de cuisson des pancakes, de manière générale un peu fadouille), tout comme le restaurant (personnel gentil toutefois). Nous avons préféré les très bons warungs à proximité conseillés par l'hôtel (ex Ogix, Jungle, Pondok). Possibilité de louer des scooters et de faire des attractions à la carte organisées par l'hôtel. Nous recommandons.
title: Une bonne étape sur l'île de Nusa Penida

text: 来penidA住了5天，arsa santhi是个很好的选择。第一，位置不错，离码头不远开车几分钟就到，酒店有码头接送服务。离潜店也不远，酒店也安排免费的去潜店的接送服务非常的好。第二，酒店房间不多，不吵闹，客人都很安静，这点非常的好。酒店服务人员很热心，解决了不少问题。第三，关于早餐，可选择不是特别多，但是也够吃。酒店餐厅的火龙果汁不错，午餐我们潜水回来在酒店选择了一餐，蛮好吃价格也不贵。总之回推荐朋友过来入住的一家酒店。另外很重要的wifi速度够快。热水充足，泳池有孩子玩儿的浅区很好。酒店走出去不远就是海滩 只不过海滩碎珊瑚居多。酒店周边吃的餐馆不少 小卖部也有 离码头都超市也不远 。
title: 很好的酒店

text:
ATTENTION - lors du paiement par carte bancaire - une fois avoir paye l accueil revient vous voir pour vous dire que la carte n est pas passe et vous le demontre via une interface de leur banque et vous demande de refaire l operation via un autre terminal bancaire en vous disant que la premiere tentative n a pas ete debite
Or de retour en France, on a ete debite deux fois !! Sans nouvelle de leur part - ils font maintenant les morts = silence total
En me renseignant dur le web, Ca a l air d etre une pratique reguliere pas systematique au vu des commentaires positifs 
Vous etes maitenant informe du risque de cette pratique mafieuse de cet hotel
title: Ils ont debites 2 fois notre sejour - des voleurs

text:
Очень комфортный и уютный отель в километре от пристани. Хорошие номера, красивая территория, очень позитивный и отзывчивый персонал. 
Хорошая еда, красивый бассейн.
Фена и сейфа в номере нет, но попросили на ресепшене и фен нам дали до конца отдыха :).
Отелю огромное спасибо за позитивное времяпровождение!
Есть продуктовый минимаркет в 5 минутах ходьбы. 
На байках по острову кататься сложно (дороги убитые совсем), поэтому нанимали машину с водителем 50 дол. в день (не проблема найти через интернет, думаю и отель легко организует) и катались по красивейшим местам.
Очень рекомендую поплавать с мантами в МантаПоинт - ощущения незабываемые.
title: Идеальное соотношение цена-качество!

text:
Un séjour inoubliable dans ce très bel hôtel à taille humaine dans lequel nous avons séjourné 4 jours. 
L’hôtel est très propre et le personnel est très gentil et à l’écoute de ses clients.
Mention spéciale à Gede et Yasa ! 
Nous recommandons cet endroit !!
title: Exceptionnel !

text: Abbiamo prenotato in questa struttura all'ultimo momento ma si è rivelata davvero una scelta eccellente. La posizione è strategica, molto vicino al porto di Toyapakeh dove arrivano le fast boat da Bali e Nusa Lembongan e di fatto rappresenta un'ottima base per visitare l'isola. La struttura è di recente costruzione, con camere ampie e confortevoli (menzione particolare per il letto, veramente comodo) e bagno pulito. Molto rilassante la zona comune, con una bellissima piscina. I membri dello staff sono estremamente gentili e disponibili e offrono la possibilità di prenotare i biglietti della fast boat, noleggiare scooter e organizzare tour dell'isola con driver privato a prezzi abbastanza convenienti (comunque trattabili). Niente male anche il ristorante dell'hotel, economico e con buona scelta di piatti. In sintesi, struttura assolutamente da consigliare come punto di partenza per esplorare Nusa Penida, isola ancora piuttosto selvaggia ma davvero suggestiva, che merita senz'altro un soggiorno di 2-3 notti.
title: Ottima base per visitare Nusa Penida

text: A mio avviso, il posto perfetto per Nusa Penida. Ottima struttura, camera enorme e pulita. Possibilità di noleggiare lo scooter o di un driver per girare l'isola. Colazione buona, ristorante con ottimi prezzi e piatti interessanti. Consigliato
title: Il top di Nusa Penida

text:
We liked this hotel very much, as well as the island! It is very quiet, near nice restaurants, the staff is very nice,caring and friendly!!! Nice experience, highly recommended!! 

Nos gustó mucho este hotel, igual que la isla. Es muy tranquilo, está cerca de restaurantes donde se come muy bien y el trato de los empleados es muy amigable y cercano. Ha sido una muy buena experiencia y la recomendamos mucho!!
title: Very nice! / muy agradable!

text:

text:
Dit hotel ligt in Tokapayeh, redelijk dicht bij de haven bij aankomst vanuit Sanur of Penida. Het is (nu nog) 1 van de weinige luxere verblijven op Penida, maar dat zal zeker veranderen met het rappe tempo dat hier gebouwd wordt aan nieuwe accommodaties. 
Het hotel doet zn best om bij te blijven, ze bouwen nu een nieuw houten verblijf naast het heerlijke zwembad (voldoende ligbedjes en parasols). Tja dat kan overdag wat overlast geven en niemand wil dat in ZIJN vakantie, liever in die van een ander haha. Maar goed als ze willen blijven verbeteren zal er altijd iemand iets van merken dus laat je daar niet door weerhouden. 

De kamers zijn super ruim, net als het gigantische tweepersoons bed, dat redelijk stevig is. Goede airco, klein koelkastje op de kamer en een grote regendouche (warm water!) in de badkamer. De kamers zijn wat gehorig, maar acceptabel. Dagelijkse schoonmaak incl schone handdoeken hebben we nog niet bij veel hotels in deze omgeving gehad.  
Het ontbijt is redelijk simpel, prima. Miss een puntje van verbetering om het hotel op een hoger niveau te tillen.

In de directe omgeving een paar prima restaurantjes als alternatief voor het restaurant van het hotel. 

Het personeel heeft voor ons het belangrijkste verschil gemaakt!! Super geholpen met ophalen/wegbrengen van naar de boot, krakkemikkige scooters gehuurd. De grootste indruk maakten ze op ons na de heftige aardbeving op Lombok, die zelfs hier heel goed voelbaar was, het personeel hield ons goed op de hoogte. Zodra er sprake was van tsunami gevaar, heeft de eigenaar van het hotel voor alle gasten vervoer geregeld en ons meegenomen naar een/zijn(??) huis op een hoger gelegen deel van het eiland. Daar werd gecheckt of iedereen er was, kregen water en hebben onszelf vermaakt totdat groen licht kwam om terug naar het hotel te kunnen. Voor het hotel de allereerste keer dat ze deze maatregel moesten treffen en dikke pluim voor de manier waarop ze dit opgepakt hebben. Er was hierdoor ook geen sprake van paniek.
title: Heerlijk verblijf op het mooie Penida

title: Tres bien

text: Llegamos desde el puerto de Sanur de Bali a Nusa Lembongan y de allí directos a Nusa Penida. Tuvimos mucha suerte ya que no operaba ningún barco ese día excepto el que cogimos. Sin madrugar, un taxi nos llevó de Semyniak a Sanur, llegando a las 12:30 y a la 13 horas tomamos el ferry. Al arribar al puerto de Nusa Penida nos estaba esperando una empleada del hotel sin haberla avisado y tras ella el transporte, cortesía del establecimiento, que nos llevó hasta allí. Al hacer el checking, preguntamos para alquilar un coche sin conductor al igual que habíamos hecho en Bali y nos dijeron que en esa isla la única posibilidad era alquiler un coche con taxista o moto, por el mal estado de las carreteras. Estuvimos preguntando en otros sitios y nos dijeron lo mismo que el hotel, así que para acabar fastidiados con una moto, en un trayecto de nada, vimos bastantes accidentados, decidimos tomar un coche con conductor en este alojamiento y nos encontramos con Made, un encanto, prudente, detallista sin agobiar, dejándonos a nuestro aire, conducción segura, rápida y efectiva que nos permitió conocer en un día el oeste y al otro, el este de la isla. De esta forma comprendimos, a pesar de nuestra dilatada experiencia por lugares tan diferentes, conduciendo coches de alquiler, que en esta isla se negaran a hacerlo. Nos dieron la primera cabaña de la entrada, en la parte de arriba. Me gustó la ubicación del hotel y de la cabaña asignada, la tranquilidad de la noche, las zonas comunes, los servicios de recogida y llevanza al puerto y el personal tan amable. La cama super grande y no del todo cómoda. No me gustó: El bungalow necesitaba limpieza. El lavabo del baño, por ejemplo, estaba muy sucio, nunca había visto algo así. El aparato del aire acondicionado está colocado en el techo de la segunda planta, es decir, en lo alto de nuestra cabaña. Sí el bungalow de abajo ponía el aire acondicionado, dentro de nuestra habitación se escuchaba el ruido fuerte de un transformador que molestaba hasta que lo apagaban. Los desayunos son normales,  nada que destacar y el wifi funciona regular.Por estas circunstancias, lo he  contemplado como un hotel normal que podría ganar mucho si le dieran solución a estos inconvenientes.
title: Ha sido todo muy fácil, gracias a este hotel, pero todo no es perfecto.

text: Wir haben 3 Nächte im Arsa Santhi gewohnt, mit leckerem Frühstück, neues großes geräumiges Zimmer, kleine private Terrasse, alles sehr sauber und ein Superservice, wir wurden zur nahegelegenen Tauchschule Blue corner Dive gefahren und auch der Shuttle zur Fähre war inclusive, die Scooter zum Mieten  waren startklar. Bei unserem nächsten Besuch auf Nusa Penida kommen wir gerne wieder in das Arsi Santhi.
title: Arsa santhi

text:
Stoppet tre dager på hotellet her, eit kjempe fint område med lyse reine fine rom/bungalow.
Betjeningen er veldig behjelpelig med transport og ordner med guida turer, til alle dei populære strendene og plasser som er vert og oppleve.
